title: Describes the configuration of a GitHub Organization
description: Describes the configuration of a GitHub Organization via a YAML file

billing_email.description: The billing email for the organization

company.description: The company name for the organization

email.description: The publicly visible email for the organization

twitter_username.description: The twitter username for the organization

has_organization_projects.description: Whether or not the organization has projects enabled

has_repository_projects.description: Whether or not the organization has repository projects enabled

default_repository_permission.description: The default repository permission for the organization

members_can_create_repositories.description: Whether or not members can create repositories in the organization

members_can_create_internal_repositories.description: Whether or not members can create internal repositories in the organization

members_can_create_private_repositories.description: Whether or not members can create private repositories in the organization

members_can_create_public_repositories.description: Whether or not members can create public repositories in the organization

members_can_create_pages.description: Whether or not members can create pages in the organization

members_can_create_public_pages.description: Whether or not members can create public pages in the organization

members_can_create_private_pages.description: Whether or not members can create private pages in the organization

members_can_fork_private_repositories.description: Whether or not members can fork private repositories in the organization

web_commit_signoff_required.description: Whether or not web commit signoff is required in the organization

members.description: A list of members of the organization

teams.description: A list of teams in the organization

parent.description: The slug of the parent team

members.description: A list of members of the team

repos.description: A list of repositories in the organization

has_issues.description: Whether or not the repository has issues enabled

has_projects.description: Whether or not the repository has projects enabled

has_wiki.description: Whether or not the repository has wiki enabled

is_template.description: Whether or not the repository is a template

allow_squash_merge.description: Whether or not squash merging is allowed

allow_merge_commit.description: Whether or not merge commits are allowed

delete_branch_on_merge.description: Whether or not branches are deleted on merge

members.description: A list of members of the team

checks.description: A list of behaviours to apply to the organization

unknown_teams.description: Behaviour to apply if an unknown teams is found

unknown_members.description: Behaviour to apply if an unknown member is found

unknown_repositories.description: Behaviour to apply if an unknown repository is found

outside_collaborator_elevated_permission.description: Behaviour to apply if an outside collaborator has elevated permissions

repository_collaborator_direct_membershi.description: Behaviour to apply if a repository collaborator has direct membership to a given repository
